name: Remind101, Inc.
description: Provider of a real-time messaging application designed to bridge the communication gap in primary education. The company's real-time messaging application schedules reminders ahead of time, as well as coordinates the logistics of school-related activities, enabling teachers, parents, students and administrators in K-12 schools to communicate with each other.
